local_intent: Perform a straight 0.1 push of the T-block at 0° after alignment and yaw set.
assumptions: Direction 0° corresponds to the intended push axis in the scene.
Setting TCP yaw to 0° yields a push-friendly tool orientation.
Clear path exists to push the block by 0.1 without collisions.
coherence_with_global: Matches global steps: detect t_block → move above → approach/align → set yaw 0 → push(distance=0.1, direction=0).
